7.m: She will bear a son, and you shall call his name Jesus, for he will save his people from their sins. - Matthew 1:21 (ESV)

l.q: What kind of man was Joseph?
l.a: Joseph was a just man, and he was unwilling to put Mary to shame. He was also obedient to God, he took Mary for his wife when he learned that the child in her womb is from the Holy Spirit.

l.q: What does the name Immanuel mean?
l.a: Immanuel means God is with us.

l.q: Why should Joseph name his son 'Jesus'?
l.a: Joseph should name his son 'Jesus' because Jesus will save his people from their sins.

7.p: Our Father, thank you for making heaven a possibility for us through your Son. I cherish and I am grateful for the days that I get to spend with my spouse, my children, my family, and my friends, wishing for those happy moments to stretch forever. But more than these happy moments, we are made for your glory. The truth is, our days here on earth are numbered. Lord, for those whose hearts are made right with you through Jesus Christ, our life does not merely end on earth. I can look forward to celebrating life after death where everything is perfect and there is no more pain and sadness and fears. I pray for those whom I know and love, that they will also accept your gift of eternal life. In Christ's name. Amen.
